page.title: 07HEALTH AROUND LIDLINGTON
page.content:
THE DOCTORS FOR THIS AREA COME FORM AMPTHILL,CRANFIELD AND WOBURN. SURGERIES ARE HELD IN LIDLINGTON AND BROGBOROUGH TWICE A WEEK. NEAREST CHEMIST AND OPTICIAN IS IN AMPTHILL.NEAREST HOSPITAL IS IN BEDFORD.
THE BABY CLINIC VISITS THE VILLAGES ONCE A FORTNIGHT.ALL VACCINATIONS AND PRE_SCHOOL DEVELOPMENT TESTS ARE AVAILABLE.
THE CHOROPODIST VISITS EVERY TWO MONTHS.HEALTH VISITORS,DISTRICT NURSES AND MIDWIVES ATTEND PATIENTS IN THEIR OWN HOME.SOCIAL SERVICES OFFER,HOME HELP,HOME CARE,AND MEALS ON WHEELS. ANTENATEL CARE IS ON A SHARED CARE BASIS.
NEAREST DENTIST IS IN AMPTHILL.
